dosasm.command.cleanalldianose: Clean all diagnose information generated by MASM/TASM
dosasm.config.toolspath.mddescription: the path of your tools folder for assembly, if defined this folder should have folder `masm` and `tasm` for assmebler and should have folder `player` or `dosbox` for windows
dosasm.command.dosboxhere: Dosbox here: Open DosBox, Mount the path of the editor files's folder as E:\ and set the needed environment
dosasm.config.masmortasm.description: use TASM or MASM to operate your assembly codes
dosasm.config.emulator.description: Use DOSBox or MSDOS-player as 16-bit emulator for windows
dosasm.config.emulator.dosbox: Use DOSBox,this may be more stable
dosasm.config.emulator.player: Use MSDOS-player for most cases(use dosbox for TD),this may be more quiet
dosasm.config.emulator.auto: Auto select: use MSDOS-player to compile,use dosbox to runï¼Œuse dosbox for TD.exe,MSDOS player for debug.exe
dosasm.config.savefirst: Save the file before Open dosbox, run and debug ASM codes
dosasm.config.boxrun.description: What to do after run code in dosbox
dosasm.config.boxrun.enum1: do nothing, manually input exit or click 'x' or press 'Ctrl+F9' to exit
dosasm.config.boxcommand: If defined, the extension will use this command to open dosbox instead of default command
dosasm.config.boxconsole.description: what to do with the console window
dosasm.config.boxconsole.min:
- For windows, use command like `start/min dosbox`, this will **Minimize** the console window
- for other OS, will not process the console information
dosasm.config.boxconsole.normal:
- For windows, use command like `dosbox`, this will **Create** a console window by dosbox
- for other OS, will not process the console information
dosasm.config.boxconsole.noconsole:
don't show console

- For windows, use command like `dosbox -noconsole` to redirect the console stdout and stderr to files
- for other OS, will not process the console information
dosasm.config.boxconsole.redirect-show: Redirect the console stdout and stderr to VSCode output channel, and show. For windows it will not display in real time
dosasm.config.boxconsole.redirect: Redirect the console stdout and stderr to VSCode output channel. For windows it will not display in real time
dosasm.config.boxconfig.description: dosbox configurations that will be used, see [link](https://www.dosbox.com/wiki/Dosbox.conf),use property like `"AUTOEXEC":"echo hi\ndir"` if need to use *AUTOEXEC*
dosasm.config.hover: Display Hover information or not, restart VSCode to apply
dosasm.config.PLF: Experimental programmatic language features like outline,jump to definition/reference. Restart needed
dosasm.config.separateSpace:
Use a Separate space to keep the workspace clean.The extension will copy source code file to this space

*NOTE*:if Enabled this, currently will have probleam with multi-file assembly
